name: DVORNIK ADVENTURE (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
You are a Janitor ("Dvornik" in Russia) named Guido. Aggressive eco-activists held the "Keep It Alive" eco-festival in your native Liechtenstein. And you have to clean up the consequences of this festival. It's not fair. Guido is not happy with this.
You can collect and share garbage in the right containers, as well as search for secret items. It depends on you whether Guido will be satisfied or not.

Play with keyboard (WASD + Space/LMB) or with Gamepad (XBox 360 works fine).

This game was created by members of Beard Games Studio and with "sound help":
1) Oleg Konstantinov - all logic and bugs (https://www.facebook.com/oleg.konstantinov.5)
2) Dmitry Shingarev - all visual and leveldesign (https://furyandmadness.artstation.com/)
3) Efim Hazein - all sound and music (https://vk.com/efim_hazein)

Follow Beard Games Studio in twitter: @BeardGameStudio

P.S. be healthy and safty :3

P.P.S. It was f**king hard
